ygData.subject: RE: Here's a clip from the elite Innoruuk guild.
ygData.msgSnippet: -wow- They are almost as bad, as FoH is on Veeshan (Fruits of Heaven, as I like to call them) I may be on Mithaniel Mar, but I have had my run ins when
ygData.messageBody:
-wow-
They are almost as bad, as FoH is on Veeshan (Fruits of Heaven, as I like to
call them) I may be on Mithaniel Mar, but I have had my run ins when
visiting a friend on Veeshan, and on Illsik Haucil message boards.
=) Sorry you have to put up with that on Innoruuk. It isnt right.

-Martyn



This is very typical, btw. LoD will barge in and take over
anything from anybody, even if plans are made. This was
after a lot of people posted the fall of Cazic, where LoD
failed to drop him.

--clip--

You got Cazic. Congrats. Couple of you guys are actually using the
success of many many brave adventurers to try and put down LoD. Tell you
what, not gonna happen. Wanna know why ? We do things with ONE guild and
only a couple of SKILLED players. Not throwing numbers at each and
everything. So like, thinking you can match us or even top us is quite
silly. It's two diffrent things ya know. I have yet to see ONE guild
accomplish anything bigger than taking down the ghoul lord without the
help of 765743654 other guilds and unguilded ppl.

Again, you made server wide efforts to break fear and finally got it done
a while ago. Quite an accomplishment. Then, again a server wide effort got
you the victory over Cazic. Nice jobs. But nothing to brag about and think
"hey, now we own LoD cuz they didnt kill him" because you can't compare a
server wide effort with just one guild killing gods and dragons. The one
thing is nothing but brute force, the other is skill. No guild on Innoruuk
other than LoD is even remotely close to beeing able to kill a god or
dragon. Pantheon may at some point be able to pull it off, but they still
have a long way to go. But at least they are organized and smart.

But I have to admit that I was impressed you could get Cazic with numbers
actually. I won't be impressed again until I see ONE guild accomplish
something without the help of 7657653473 other ppl.

--clip--

This is the bullshit people have to put up with on Innoruuk.
I doubt anyone will be able to do either dragons, while this
guild exists.

Harmonic.
